===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# A pale brownish-red powder used in traditional [[Mongolian]] medicine to "remove ''heat'' from the heart and lungs, to regulate the flow of [[qi]], and to induce sedation, when there is ''exuberant fire'' in the heart and lungs, indicated by distress in the chest, costal and hypochondriac stuffiness/pain, cardiac palpitation and shortness of breath".

The herbal formulation of Bawei Qingxin Chenxiang powder is:
